subemotions.name: Ecstacy
subemotions.description: Rapturous delight. A state of very great happiness, nearly overwhelming.

subemotions.name: Wonder
subemotions.description: An experience of something that is vey surprising, beautiful, amazing or hard to believe.

subemotions.name: Vengefulness
subemotions.description: Desire to retaliate after one is hurt.

subemotions.name: Sorrow
subemotions.description: A feeling of distress and sadness, often caused by a loss.

subemotions.name: Horror
subemotions.description: A mixture of fear, disgust, and shock.

subemotions.name: Loathing
subemotions.description: Intense disgust focused on a person. Intense disugust focused on oneself is called self-loathing.

subemotions.name: Abhorrence
subemotions.description: A mixture of intense disgust and hatred.

subemotions.name: Revulsion
subemotions.description: A mixture of disgust and loathing.
